metadata.name: The first Christmas is never forgotten
metadata.description:
Christmas is my favorite time of the year, and this is my first Christmas in the NFTs space

Every year I'll drop an open edition for Christmas, and this is the first!

A wonderful night on the Italian Dolomites, in front of Cimon Della Pala. During the winter, the cold and the silence, create this magical atmosphere.

Happy Christmas my friend! 

Artist: Nicola Manfredi  

Bio: 
Nicola Manfredi is a landscape photographer born and raised in the realm of the Dolomites. His works are often inspired by the fantasy world, in particular by the works of Tolkien.

Jpeg Size: 4024 × 6048 pixel

License: NFT can be used in advertising, private displays and in exhibitions by the NFT holder, as long as the artist is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution or derivative works. The artist holds the Copyright.
